generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings, extending into the distance, which is the primary surface for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by trees and a fence, designed for pedestrian use.
- vegetation: Numerous trees line both sides of the road, and some grassy areas are visible along the sidewalk, indicating the presence of vegetation.
- terrain: Grass and some soil are visible along the edges of the sidewalk and road, classifying these areas as terrain.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the tree canopy, appearing bright and open.
- person: Two individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a silver station wagon in the foreground and other vehicles further ahead.
- traffic sign: A yellow and blue traffic sign is mounted on a pole on the right side of the road, providing directional information.
- pole: A pole supporting the traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road.
- fence: A fence runs along the right side of the road, separating the sidewalk from a more enclosed area.
